textBox.richText: Coming up on Saturday, February 2 at Midnight is a screening of the American cult classic Electra Glide in Blue (1973), about a cop who is trying to move up in the world while facing backlash from his superiors and the American society in which he does not quite belong. Directed by James William Gercio. Starring Robert Blake.
Midnight Movie: Electra Glide in Blue
